import React from "react"; import './checkout.styles.scss'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {selectCartItems} from "../../redux/cart/cart.selector"; import {selectCartTotal} from "../../redux/cart/cart.selector"; const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, cartTotal}) => { return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => ()) }
TOTAL: ${cartTotal}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cartItems: selectCartItems(state), cartTotal : selectCartTotal(state) }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
